sentences.en: A broken bone can heal, but the wound a word opens can fester forever.
sentences.cn: 骨头断了可以治愈好, 但是言语造成的伤害将会一直恶化下去.

sentences.en: After affected part is injured, return but because of infection fester.
sentences.cn: 患处损伤后还可因感染而化脓.

sentences.en: After discharging the wound fester, or healing.
sentences.cn: 伤口流脓溃烂以后, 还是会愈合的.

sentences.en: Crises were symptoms of deeper problems which if allowed to fester would prove increasingly unmanageable.
sentences.cn: 危机只是更深刻的问题的表面症候,这些问题如果任其发展,就会变得越来越难驾驭.

sentences.en: If you allow a wound to get dirty, it will probably fester.
sentences.cn: 假如你让伤口脏了, 将会化脓.

sentences.en: My wounds fester and are loathsome because of my sinful folly.
sentences.cn: 5因我的愚昧,我的伤发臭流脓.

sentences.en: My wounds grow foul and fester Because of my folly.
sentences.cn: 诗38:5因我的愚昧、我的伤发臭流脓.

sentences.en: Our wounds will continue to fester and never heal.
sentences.cn: 就永远无法修复自己的创伤,伤口会继续溃烂,永不愈合.

sentences.en: Sty fester how won't cure grow beehive to organize?
sentences.cn: 麦粒肿化脓了怎么治疗不会长蜂窝组织?

sentences.en: The chops will fester and go to waste.
The dispute can be traced back to resentments which have festered for centuries.
sentences.cn: 这一争端可以追溯到积累了好几个世纪的仇怨。

sentences.en: The leg rotted. Fester. Do how. Ache confoundedly!
sentences.cn: 腿烂了.化脓了. 咋办. 疼得要命!

sentences.en: They resolve arguments rather than letting things fester.
sentences.cn: 他们解决争端而不是放任事情一再恶化.

sentences.en: Wounds will fester if the inflammation is not reduced in time.
sentences.cn: 伤口不及时消炎是很容易溃脓的.

trans.tran_en: if an unpleasant feeling or problem festers, it gets worse because it has not been dealt with

trans.tran_cn: 化脓，溃烂，腐烂，腐败，激起怨忿，引起创痛，使衰败
